titleStmt.title: An elegy, sacred to the memory of the high-born prince, Henry D. of Grafton, who dyed of his wounds at Cork, October 9th, 1690 in Pindarick verse / by Franc. Hext.
titleStmt.author: Hext, Francis, 1666-1729.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.M., and are to be sold by Randal Taylor ...,

notesStmt.note: Author erroneously identified by Wing as Francis "Hexter".
Reproduction of original in Harvard University Libraries.
